statements: DELETE FROM food_consumption WHERE food_id = 1 AND consumption_date < '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM food_consumption WHERE food_category = 'Dairy' AND consumption_date >= '2022-07-01';
DELETE FROM SustainableFoodProduction WHERE production_location = 'Farm A' AND production_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM FoodConsumptionPatterns WHERE id = 100 AND consumption_amount > 10.5;
DELETE FROM FoodConsumption WHERE consumption_date < '2022-01-01' AND quantity > 5;
DELETE FROM FoodConsumptionPatterns WHERE userID = 1 AND foodID = 100;
DELETE FROM FoodItems WHERE category = 'Vegetables' AND calories < 50;
DELETE FROM user_profiles WHERE user_age < 30 OR user_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM food_items WHERE item_category = 'Fruits' AND item_name LIKE 'Apple%';
